title: Criminalist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Analyse someone and find some of their potential identities. You will learn three roles written on The Criminal List, one of them which is their true role. At least one of the roles you learn must be good and one must be evil.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of game, The Criminal List is publicly announced with every role in the game plus 5 fake roles who don't exist. The fake roles can exist according to the rolelist.
- Investigating the same person twice will give the same result. When you investigate an evil player, they will learn the results.
